name: Jump Champ
description:
Made for Mini Jam 106 Frogs².

Controls

  • Aim with your mouse and click to jump.
  • Eat flies by moving close to them to gain extra time.
  • You get one bonus lilypad every 10 seconds to save you from falling into the water or to take another route.

Assets

Graphics made by myself.

Most sounds made with bfxr.

Font: Pixel Font

Eating sound: Chewing, Carrot, A by InspectorJ.

Clock Ringing sound: Analog Alarm Clock by bone666138.

Clock Ticking sound: Clock.wav by Tetrisrocker.
